label: Weapon · Exhibit 139
name: Mannlicher-Carcano Rifle
description: 6.5mm Italian carbine with serial number C2766, identified as the weapon used in the assassination. Recovered from the 6th floor of the TSBD.

label: Object · Exhibit 142
name: Brown Paper Sack
description: Large handmade paper bag found on the 6th floor of the TSBD. Alleged by the Warren Commission to have carried the rifle; alleged by Oswald to have contained 'curtain rods'.
